name: Offender
description:
⚠️THE CURRENT BUILD OF THIS GAME IS A DEMO AND  FEATURES ONLY ONE PLAYABLE LEVEL.⚠️

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

  • a videogame adaptation of Offenderman, developed in collaboration with Arcanineryu, the original creator. 

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

  • Offender is an anthology game featuring 3 playable levels. The aim of each level is to evade Offender while exploring dark, eerie environments and discovering clues about his origin story and the victims he has left in his wake. Each level is designed to be a unique and chilling experience, from suspenseful chases to terrifying revelations that will keep players on the edge of their seat until the very end.
